# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and durability, it's truly a value for those who appreciate quality. Considering its worth to us and its utility to you, I propose a price of $95 for this product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between value and cost. Thank you for considering our offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
